participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily finds joy in self-expression and the small pleasures of life.
participant_1.background: I love dressing up in hunter green, even if it makes my family laugh. we have two sons. I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents. I am a full-time mom. I have a poodle named Nanette.

participant_2.name: Santiago
participant_2.personality: Passionate and artistic, Santiago channels his emotions into his creative pursuits while caring deeply for others.
participant_2.background: I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday. I don't eat meat. I take my emotions out through art. I love being able to use my music to help children in need. I am Argentinian.

content.text: Great! How are you? My birthday was last week so I was eating a lot of ice cream and writing in my novel.
Oh that sounds fun! I love eating ice cream and writing in my journal too.
That's awesome! What kind of journal do you have?
I have a leather bound journal that I got for my birthday a few years ago. I love it because it's so pretty and it's the perfect size for my purse.
That sounds amazing! I love leather bound journals too. I have a few that I love to write in.
Nice! I'm so glad to meet someone who also loves writing.
Me too! It's so therapeutic to be able to express yourself through writing.
Exactly! I love being able to get my thoughts and feelings out on paper.
Me too! It's so helpful to be able to process things and let go of negative emotions.
Exactly! I'm so glad to have met you!
Me too! It's been nice talking to you!
